title.narrative: Human african trypanosomiasis (HAT) or sleeping sickness

description.narrative: 1. Continue to support implementation of and access to fexinidazole as a new all-oral treatment for the treatment of stage-1 and stage-2 HAT caused by T.b. gambiense (g-HAT) in adults and children. 2. Develop and register acoziborole as a new, single-dose, oral treatment 3. Maintain back-up drugs candidate oxaboroles to replace acoziborole, if needed (SCYX-1330682 & SCYX-1608210).
DNDi aims to deliver new oral treatments to cure sleeping sickness that are safe affordable effective and easy to use and support the sustainable elimination of the disease.
